recipe.title: Wilted Greens
ingredients: 1 large bunch Swiss chard, stems cut from leaves and discarded, leaves torn
1 large bunch mustard greens, stems trimmed, leaves torn
1/3 cup chicken stock or canned low-salt chicken broth
instructions: Melt butter in heavy large pot over medium-high heat. Add all greens and stock. Cover and cook until greens wilt, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes. Uncover; cook until juices thicken slightly, about 4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
